arts.ttl: Manuel Neuer takes responsibility for Union Berlin's opener against Bayern
arts.sum: Manuel Neuer admits his mistake led to Union Berlin's opener in Saturday's Bundesliga game in the German capital.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin end Bayern Munich's winning start to the campaign in thrilling draw
arts.sum: Union Berlin's defensive stalwart Danilho Doekhi fires home the opening goal past Manuel Neuer, giving the hosts a deserved lead against the Bundesliga champions. Bayern Munich's winning start to the season came to an end as they were held to a thrilling 2-2 draw by Union Berlin at the Stadion an der Alten Försterei, although Harry Kane's late header did salvage at least a point for the Bavarians.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin ends Bayern Munich’s record 16-game winning streak with 2-2 draw in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Dutch defender Danilho Doekhi struck twice for Union Berlin to hold the Bavarian powerhouse 2-2 in the Bundesliga on Saturday, ending Bayern’s record 16-game winning streak in all competitions to start the season. Union continued to dominate and deservedly went ahead in the 27th when Janik Haberer surprised the Bayern defense with a low corner and Danilho Doekhi swept the ball past Manuel Neuer.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich finally drop points - Union Berlin end unbelievable win streak at 16 games
arts.sum: The winning streak has come to an end. Bayern Munich’s dominance over European football has been incredible over the last few months. For 16 games straight, Bayern raced from victory to...

arts.ttl: Kane rescues point for Bayern as 16-game winning streak ends against Union Berlin
arts.sum: 1. FC Union Berlin were close to beating Bayern Munich, but Harry Kane salvaged a point for the German champions in injury time.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs Bayern Munich Predicted Line-ups: Attacking changes for the visitors

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich XI vs Union Berlin – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich visit the Stadion An der Alten Försterei on Saturday as they face Union Berlin, with the Bundesliga champions keen to preserve their flawless record this season. Bayern, unbeaten in their last sixteen outings across all competitions, are chasing a remarkable 17th straight win. arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Bayern Munich preview: Leaders out to maintain perfect record
arts.sum: Bayern Munich will look to maintain their 100% record in the 2025-26 campaign when they travel to the Stadion An der Alten Försterei for Saturday's Bundesliga meeting with Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Kompany discusses possible rotation ahead of Union Berlin clash
arts.sum: Vincent Kompany has discussed the possibility of rotating his Bayern Munich squad for Saturday’s game against 1. FC Union Berlin.
